title: Faulty DEP reports set difficult precedents for communities fighting shale
text: " If you make a mistake, you have to live with that mistake for the next 60 years. " - Cindy Fisher READ MORE: Pa. regulators fail to protect environment during Marcellus Shale Boom READ MORE: DEP aware of environmental violations years
